body_html:
Thanks much for prompt reply!
2015. 12. 6. 오전 7:09에 "Geoffrey Irving" notifications@github.com님이 작성:

I recently fixed tf.range to accept between 1 and 3 arguments (like
Python's range). This change will be part of the upcoming 0.6.0 release,
but you're using the 0.5.0 release, and a version of cifar10 from git.
Quick fix: use tf.range(0, FLAGS.batch_size) instead of
tf.range(FLAGS.batch_size).

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#415 (comment)
.
